value:
I am certain to know of any and
all facts that concern your activities.
My dear, lovely Lucia...

Lady Lucia and her brother misjudge
me. The house of Count Delbray is in
need of a strong hand to guide it.$k$pAs is the kingdom of Crimea...

Citizens exist to be ruled by nobility.
It is as natural as the wind existing to
blow. There is no need to dwell on it.

My house's lineage lies close to the
royal family, so it should not be
difficult to gather the lords' support.$k$pCrimea and its glorious history
beckon me!

Crimea is in chaos and requires a
strong arm as king. As a man from
house Felirae, I am a fitting choice.$k$pFor my queen, a woman of the blood
of house Delbray would be most
suitable!

I am Ludveck, duke of Felirae, here
in response to your invitation. My
thanks for your reception.$k$pPlease accept this message in lieu
of a monetary gift.

Will you crawl back to me, face wet
with tears, begging for mercy? How I
pray to see that face, Your Majesty!

A kingdom cannot stand without a
strong king. He is essential for
any country.

There's no way I can lose,
considering that I have a card which
has yet to be put into the game.

I do not know your end game here...
But I must use this offering to
become stronger.

I am Crimea's duke of Felirae. If you
wish to meet with me, offer a seat
and service befitting my station.

I can understand if you are not aware
of innocent little Elincia's true nature.$k$pShe is quick to let her guard down
and naively believes everything she
is told.$k$pWhat if she is speaking to a fool, or
someone with a hidden weapon?
What if an offered drink is poisoned?$k$pA country, even a court, in such an
uncertain state breeds discouraged
hearts and unrest.$k$pUnder such conditions, Crimea would
never see a revival. Hm...$k$pPerhaps someone like Bastian will
write about how my insurrection was
dealt with in one swift stroke...$k$pHow it was a triumph for the regime,
how they could deal with those who
opposed the queen all at once.$k$pBut such division leaves lingering
grudges regardless. Only a resolute
ruler can bring order to such chaos.$k$pLady Lucia, Bastian...show me your
resolve. You and your beloved queen.$k$pTo the glory and future of Crimea!
This is most perfect.
Could my luck be better?
Such fragile defenses!
Mu-hu-hu-ha-ha-ha-ha-ha!
My ambitions...
I am Ludveck, duke of Felirae. I am here in answer to your summons.
Hm? Do you have need of me?
No matter the might of an army, if the ruler leading it is weak...
I want to protect my country â€” protect Crimea.
My dear, lovely Lucia... You truly are a gem among stones.
Queen Elincia, you're so naive.
Are you truly a strong leader? I will be the one to judge that.
Certainly.
Where to?
But of course.
